channel.title: [Delta] Adding Object Options to new Objects ~Read~ Reply -Solved-
channel.description: Ok how do I make an object have another option to it like when you right click it because atm the object I want to use just has an examine and I want to add another for recharging your prayer points.

item.title: [Delta] Adding Object Options to new Objects ~Read~ Reply -Solved-
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

ok
goto your clientside
open class46.java
under the switch statement
add this

case @@@@: //change the @'s to the object id
class46.aString739 = "OBJ NAME"; //The Object Name
class46.aStringArray786[0] = "Recharge"; //option
class46.aByteArray777 = "DESCRIPTION.".getBytes();	 //description			
break;

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Adding Object Options to new Objects ~Read~ Reply -Solved-
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I don’t think I understand what you mean…

But if it is what I’m thinking…

if(objectID == 10638 || objectID == 409 || objectID == 411 || objectID == 4859){
    if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) {
        sM("You already have full Prayer points.");
    } else {
    setAnimation(645);
        playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
        sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
        sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013);
        sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012);
        sM("You recharge your Prayer points.");
    }

}

Which is an Alter.

Read full topic
